attributes.action: Jail time for people abusing & killing animals & being banned from keeping them
attributes.additional_details: Everyday people are seeing pictures from the public abusing animals, a man was seen with a puppy to young to be walked being dragged down a street from exhaustion another man was seen beating his dog in a street and people videoed this but done nothing to help, i want a law that the public can intervene if this is witnessed or call the police who need to respond asap. there is many more heart-breaking cases and there needs to be a register to let everyone know who is a abuser!
attributes.background: Everyday I read in papers animals being stabbed, abused, killed and nothing is being done, the rspca & the sspca cannot stop these people, i want jail time and a register that stops these people keeping animals and that the public have access to this to report anyone seen with pets.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

It's already possible to be banned from keeping animals and to receive a prison sentence for animal abuse. You can find out more here: https://www.sentencingcouncil.org.uk/offences/item/animal-cruelty-revised-2017/

We're therefore not sure what further action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
